application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Submission of details, including physical samples, of all materials to be used on the existing and proposed external surfaces of the building, boundary walls and ground surfaces, pursuant to Condition 5; details of the proposed new and replacement windows, pursuant to Condition 6; full details of the windows to be installed, including their design (including profile, cills, head and reveals, materials, finish and colour), pursuant to Condition 12; details for any proposed structural works in the submission of a detailed report and method statement by a suitably qualified and experienced chartered structural engineer, pursuant to Condition 14; and details including plans showing the location of all proposed new radiators, and manufacturers specifications, details including samples of any proposed boiler flues and new external pipework, and a detailed method statement and schedule of works with full particulars for all works relating to the proposed services including, but not limited to, the installation of the proposed plantroom and integration of the services into the existing system, pursuant to partial discharge of Condition 16 of planning permission reference: 2024/00727/FUL dated 28th May 2024.
